pages.text: The Gluon Gun is not just a weapon but can be used as an instant mining tool. It shoots beams of Glueballs which destroy anything in its way. It uses Glueball Cells for ammo.

The Gluon Gun has two modes: $(l)Breaking$() which breaks blocks with the equivalent of fortune IV and $(l)Silk Touch$() which breaks blocks with silk touch. Switching between modes is done with a shift right click.
